survey_name: Electric Scooter Sharing Service Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on the electric scooter sharing service to improve service quality and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you use the electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for using the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional text input (SINGLE_CHOICE with open-ended follow-up)

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for using the electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of scooters in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this satisfaction question.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of scooters in your area?

questions.question_text: What features would you like to see added to the service?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to gather comprehensive feedback.

script.question_text: What features would you like to see added to the service?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving the electric scooter sharing service?
